fr.istic.m1.aco.miniediteur.v1.receiver

Interface MoteurEdition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoteurEditionImpl

    public interface MoteurEdition
    This is the main interface of the Mini Editor's engine. This interface takes the roles of 1. the receiver which has some placeholder for some concrete command interaction with receiver 2. the Subject to update all Observers
    Author:
    jiyoung
